name: Daniel Kirpes
text: Some of the best pizza in the country. Has great pasta, salads, burgers, and non alcoholic drinks. Great place for a group all looking for different things. I can't wait to come back!

text: Our waitress was fantastic!  The food not so much.  Ordered a steak salad and steak was so tough I couldn't even chew it.  Drink special was even worse.  However chicken cobb salads were very good.  Beer was cold.  Hence the 3 star rating.   Nice tv screens for watching games in the bar area!

text: It's ok. It's a Boston's so food it typical of this chain and only average compared to most Boston's we have frequented in Canada. Atmosphere isn't great. Kind of bright and loud. SO if you like that kind of thing it's ok.

text: Great place to stop on drive between Phoenix and Tucson.  Sports bar & restaurant so very casual.  Lots of tv's.  Good salads, burgers, soups, pizza and more.  Friendly service. Just 1/2 mile off the freeway at exit 194 on the west side behind mini market near Shell station.

name: Elaine Noriz

There was plastic found in my husband's pizza they compted it but they said sorry and was so nice.... I appreciate the nice service most people are rude .
